data.title: List Of Top 10 Diamond Jewellery Brands In India
data.meta_description: List of top 10 diamond brands in India 1. Mia by tanishq, 2. Malabar gold and diamonds, 3. Candere by Kalyan, 4. Orra and more
data.text:
India has a rich heritage in the world of diamonds and brands of diamond jewellery, which are known for their pristine workmanship and exquisite designs.

Tanishq, Malabar Gold & Diamonds, and PC Jeweller are some of the diamond brands in India known for their quality and superiority. This list of diamond jewellery brands in India highlights the top 10 famous diamond brands to meet your special jewellery needs.

List of The Best Diamond Brands Online

We have brought to you the list of top 10 diamond jewellery brands in India online based on certain factors. They are as follows:

Popularity: Diamond brands’ popularity among customers

Quality: The clarity and quality of the diamonds used in the jewellery used by the brand.

Trust Factor: Customer care, reviews, delivery, and more.

Based on each factor, we have listed the best diamond brands in India for you. Explore the top brands of diamond jewellery in India to have a wonderful shopping experience.

Mia By Tanishq

Mia by Tanishq is a well-known diamond brand in India, evoking modern elegance and allure. Mia creates magnificent diamond jewellery that perfectly connects refinement with trendsetting designs, catering to the modern woman. Mia by Tanishq provides a varied assortment of diamond-studded rings, necklaces, earrings, and bracelets with a focus on creativity.

Malabar Gold and Diamonds

Malabar Gold & Diamonds is known for fusing traditional designs with contemporary trends, and its diamond-studded items include diamond rings, necklaces, bangles, and earrings. Their focus on precision and quality guarantees that each piece of diamond jewellery exudes radiance and appeal. Malabar Gold & Diamonds has established itself as a treasured destination for consumers seeking elegance and sophistication through diamond jewellery.

Candere By Kalyan

Candere, an emerging diamond jewellery brand in India, was acquired by Kalyan group. Candere, which was founded with the goal of redefining gold and diamond jewellery, provides a stunning collection of exquisitely created diamond jewels. Candere, from the Kalyan family, specialises in stunning diamond jewellery ranging from rings to necklaces and bracelets. The brand addresses eager clients worldwide with an online presence, displaying a devotion to quality, authenticity, and great craftsmanship in their gorgeous diamond jewellery.

Orra

Orra has earned a reputation in India as a famous diamond brand for its beautiful craftsmanship and exceptional quality. Startig its journey in 1888, Orra first began operations with sourcing, manufacturing, and sculpting diamonds and now retails the finest at Orra’s stores across the country. Orra is known for its precision-cut diamonds and a wide selection of exquisite diamond jewellery, including rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets.

P C Jeweller

PC Jeweller has grown from humble beginnings in Delhi to become a notable diamond brand in India. PC Jeweller specialises in magnificent diamond collections and is known for its superb craftsmanship and broad variety of jewellery offers. Their emphasis on precision-cut diamonds is reflected in a gorgeous collection of diamond-studded items such as rings, necklaces, earrings, and bangles.

Caratlane

CaratLane is a pioneering diamond brand online in India, having been launched in 2008 with the goal of revolutionising the online fine jewellery market. This Chennai-based firm redefines diamond jewellery with its modern designs and affordable luxury. CaratLane, which focuses on innovation and technology, provides a wide choice of diamond-studded jewellery, including rings, earrings, pendants, and necklaces. Their dedication to accuracy and craftsmanship is obvious in every item, which caters to a wide range of preferences with customised possibilities.

Bhima

Bhima, a well-known gold and diamond jewellery brand in India, is from Kerala and has a nine-decade history. Bhima Jewellery is known for its dedication to tradition and excellence, and it offers a stunning collection of diamond-studded ornaments. From delicately sculpted rings to extravagant necklaces and earrings, their diamond jewellery oozes workmanship and everlasting beauty. Bhima’s emphasis on quality, authenticity, and client trust has boosted its status as a trusted name in the Indian jewellery industry. Bhima continues to fascinate consumers seeking exceptional diamond jewellery, evoking a sense of refinement and cultural depth via a combination of legacy and innovation.

Joyalukkas

Joyalukkas, a mainstay in the Indian jewellery business, is a renowned gold and diamond brand known for its legacy and artistry. Joyalukkas, which originated in Kerala, has grown its legacy abroad, offering an excellent collection of diamond jewellery. Their collection features a wide range of expertly made diamond items, ranging from elegant rings to brilliant necklaces and earrings that exude timeless beauty. Joyalukkas Jewellery epitomises luxury and refinement, catering to different preferences while respecting traditions with an emphasis on quality and creativity. Their dedication to excellent design and responsibly obtained diamonds solidifies their reputation as a reliable supplier for premium diamond jewellery in India.
